concept.title: Tutorial Overview
concept.shortdesc: This tutorial shows you how to create a pipeline. You can download sample data so you can preview data as you configure the pipeline and then run the completed pipeline and monitor the results.

conbody.p: The tutorial evaluates fare payment data from a taxi company. It evaluates the credit cards used for payment to find the less-used vendors, so they might be dropped to reduce overhead.

The source data is delimited data in a file. The uses a special record format for delimited data. So in addition to introducing you to some basic concepts and pipeline configuration, you'll see how to manipulate delimited data.

You can use the basic or extended version of the tutorial. The basic version allows you to read and write to a local file system so you can use tutorial data to preview and run the pipeline. The extended version flattens and reformats the data before writing to Elasticsearch. If you don't use Elasticsearch, you can still follow along to the end without running the pipeline.
